item.title: Chinese Medicine for the Mind
item.description: Receiving the ARC for this one did its trickâ€”I ordered a copy once it was published. The sections on insomnia, anxiety (shaking exercise!), and trauma are especially helpful. Instead of isolating a few neurochemicals, it approaches the body and mind as a whole. (Note: the type is quite small in the print edition.
